name: Johnson Controls International plc
description: Johnson Controls International plc is a global leader in smart buildings, energy efficiency, and sustainable infrastructure. Founded in 1885, the company has evolved from its origins in manufacturing automotive batteries to becoming a pioneer in integrated building technology and solutions. Johnson Controls specializes in delivering innovative products, services, and solutions that optimize energy and operational efficiencies of buildings, helping customers achieve their sustainability goals. The company's offerings include building management systems, HVAC equipment, fire and security solutions, and energy storage systems. With a commitment to sustainability, Johnson Controls aims to create a safer, smarter, and more sustainable world by leveraging advanced technologies like the Internet of Things (IoT) and artificial intelligence (AI). Their global presence and extensive expertise allow them to serve a wide array of sectors, including healthcare, education, manufacturing, and commercial real estate. Johnson Controls is committed to driving progress in energy efficiency, reducing carbon emissions, and enhancing the quality of life through smart building technologies and sustainable solutions.
